article_title: UAMS Eyes Expansion, Sees Increase in Patient Demand
article_text: The Affordable Care Act as applied in Arkansas has worked so well for the University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences that administrators are considering expanding the 10-story UAMS Medical Center.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news
